definitions.text: a note that alternates rapidly with another note a semitone above it
the articulation of a consonant (especially the consonant `r') with a rapid flutter of the tongue against the palate or uvula
examples: he pronounced his R's with a distinct trill

definitions.text: pronounce with a trill, of the phoneme `r'
sing or play with trills, alternating with the half note above or below
